entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Spurious `XFC0040` errors. #21848
  • [Testing] Finish tests for "Fix crash closing Popup with WebView" #21846
    .NET 8 SR5
  • Enable CSS for VerticalStackLayout and HorizontalStackLayout #21843
  • MAUI .NET 8.0 built with Full AOT Compilation reports a lot of `Mono : AOT NOT FOUND` #21842
  • Focus and blur event get triggered unnecessarily #21841
    Backlog
  • Span's TapGestureRecognizer not working if text is truncated #21837
    Backlog
  • Debug build works for android maui8 but release doesnt compile because file is being used by another process #21836
  • [Android] MissingMethodException when trying to get Handler for Maui View #21835
  • [XC] Infer x:DataType from BindingContext or BindingExtension.Source #21834
    Backlog
  • I think you mean that the ellipses inside the `if`s stand for the code you want executed _only_ on change? Then that implementation would make sense. #21832
  • [.Net 8] Bindable Properties Initialization with default new() #21831
  • [Android] SemanticProperties.HeadingLevel not working in ListView #21830
    Backlog
  • Maui Application not launching #21829
  • Flyout Button Disappears #21828
    Backlog
  • ToolTipProperties.Text does not update when used in DataTemplate #21827

Closed

  • .NET MAUI app crashes when entering "Editor" iOS Emulator #21849
  • ScrollView does not work inside VerticalStackLayout #21822
  • Upgrade fails, conflicting messages on installed vs needed #21825
  • XML Serializer does not work correctly in "net8.0-ios" release mode #21803
  • Magic error #21810
  • Problems Pairing VS For WIn and MACOS #21552
  • Connect To Mac - Object reference not set to an instance of an object #21344
  • App crashes when it has a button with FontImageSource in version 8.0.20 #21808
  • Build Error due to Mismatch Between `TargetFrameworkVersion` and `targetSdkVersion` #21820
  • Label FormattedString Span on Windows Bleeds Color Between Span Tag Text #21789
  • Call Dispose() on Page and ViewModel when the page is popped if they implement IDisposable #7354
    Backlog
  • I think you mean that the ellipses inside the `if`s stand for the code you want executed _only_ on change? Then that implementation would make sense. #21833
  • [X] Avoid calling ResourceDictionary.SetAndLoadSource from code generated by XamlC #19648
  • [X] Compile bindings with explicit source #20266
    .NET 9 Planning
  • .NET MAUI IOS APP CRASH on Launch Release Mode (From Azure CI/CD pipeline) after updating the MAUI.Controls to 8.0.20 #21770

PullRequests

Created

  • [ios/catalyst] fix memory leak with CollectionView #21850
    platform/iOS 🍎, memory-leak 💦
  • [net9.0] Merge main to net9.0 #21845
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [net8.0] Merge main to net8.0 #21844
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [UI Testing] Add legacy tests #21840
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing, testing-legacy-ui-tests
  • Android mipmap/appicon failing with "APT2260" #21838

Merged

  • [Trimming] Enable trimming and AOT analyzers #21505
  • [Testing] Extend NativeAOT Templates tests to cover all supported platforms #21793
  • [iOS] Fix crash closing Popup with WebView #21718
    t/bug, area/navigation 🧭, area/controls 🎮, control-webview, .NET 8 SR4
  • Hide button for screenshot on test 19509 #21823
    area/testing
  • Document NavigableElement #21507
    area/navigation 🧭

Updated

  • [WinUI] Perf when creating non-trivial grids (and other visual controls) #21818
    platform/windows 🪟, area/perf 🏎️, community ✨
  • [Housekeeping] Fix weak UITest #21796
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • [ci] Move to arcade , remove GitInfo #21487
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • CollectionView Items display issue when Header is resized on iOS - Fix #21812
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/collectionview 📃, community ✨
  • fix: Use AppContext.BaseDirectory instead of Environment.CurrentDirec… #21797
    area/blazor 🕸️, community ✨
  • Binding source generator #21725
    area/Xaml </>
  • [iOS] Implemented PrefersHomeIndicatorAutoHidden, PrefersStatusBarHidden and PreferredStatusBarUpdateAnimation Platform Specifics #20069
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area/platform
  • [iOS] Fix KeyboardScrolling for controls inside the NavBar #21806
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/shell 🐢, area/keyboard
  • [iOS] Apply contentInsets for any entry/editor in a scrollview #21807
    platform/iOS 🍎, control-entry, layout-scrollview
  • [XC] Fix x:DataType resolution for BindingContext #21454
    area/Xaml </>
  • [X] Fix TargetType simplification bug #21764
  • [iOS] Set text color of unselected TabbedPage tabs #18777
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/TabbedPage, community ✨, potential-regression
  • Fixed line break mode for buttons #20133
    area/layout 🔲, community ✨
  • [Windows] Fix pointer released event not being handled on ImageButton #21766
    platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-button
  • [Android] Fix crash navigating back #20420
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/shell 🐢, area/gestures
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #21092
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, do-not-merge, area/infrastructure 🏗️
